subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5941 has been delivered
description_text:
Hello, My package has delivered and pedals are in the box, but no haptic motors! Are they coming separately? Thank you! Best wishes, Kevin Sent from my iPhone On Jan 15, 2026, at 2:05 PM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 





 
 Your order has been delivered

 Haven't received your package yet? Let us know

 or Visit our store
 
 
 


 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Other tracking numbers:

 Items in this shipment

 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Kevin Coss,     Yes, your order was shipped in two separate packages. Here is the tracking link for the package that hasn't arrived yet.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047238969281
